summary: Chat application with typing indicators and online/offline status management in admin panel
architectural_notes: Chat system with real-time features (typing indicators)
Administrative panel for chat status management

existing_features.title: Display a typing indicator in the chat interface when the other party is actively typing a message
Add online/offline status indicator for the chat system visible in the admin panel
Provide admin controls to manually change the chat status between online and offline

new_feature_requests.summary: Add online/offline status display for chat in admin panel
Add ability to change chat status from admin panel

projectName: Add typing indicator and chat online/offline status management
